name: Titan's Claws
description: At end of turn, [freeze] cards are reduced to 0[ember] until played or discarded.
relicLoreTooltips: The sharp claws of the Titan. They were lodged into the stone as the Titan tried to escape prison we'd built for it. Now, they serve as a reminder of the strength we locked away.

additionalTooltips.title: Frozen
additionalTooltips.description: This card will not be discarded at the end of turn. [freeze] is removed when the card is played.
